TaskDoc.Summary: Sends a e-mail containing all datacenter names
TaskDoc.Description: This task can be used to send a e-mail containing all datacenter names.

TaskDoc.Summary: Enable SNMP on a Nexus device
TaskDoc.Description: This task can be used to enable SNMP on a Nexus device with read write access on the community string "whitney".

TaskDoc.Summary: Disable SNMP on a Nexus device
TaskDoc.Description: This task can be used to disable SNMP on a Nexus device removing the community string "whitney".
